column1: # Status: DRAFT - Placeholder for actual protection coordination study
# - Auto-reclose: Single-shot on 33kV feeders disabled on 11kV
# - SEF settings provide sensitive earth fault detection
# - Arc flash incident energy calculated per IEEE 1584 (see separate study)
# - Settings are preliminary and subject to detailed coordination study
# - CT/VT ratios to be confirmed based on actual equipment
# - Relay models are examples (SEL) - actual make/model per procurement
# - Testing required after commissioning and any system modifications
# - Annual verification of protection settings recommended
